Remitly | Senior Software Development Engineer | Seattle, WA | Full-time, ONSITE

We're looking for a Senior Software Development Engineer for our Platform team to help us build and grow the next version of the Remitly customer support and risk products. You will be researching and evaluating technical options followed by using standard methodologies and design patterns to architect, build, and maintain high quality systems.

Technologies include Java, JavaScript, Go, PHP, Python, or Ruby. Interest in Microservices Architecture will be highly appreciated.

Interview process: Phone screen followed by a day of onsite loop.

Apply here: https://www.remitly.com/us/en/careers/913530?from=engineerin...
